name: hiGAZERS
description: What is hiGAZERS? hiGAZERS is an ERC-20 token representing 1/1,000,000 ownership of a GAZERS in the Meta-Swap pool of Fracton Protocol. About Fracton Protocol Fracton Protocol is an NFT liquidity infrastructure with a two-step fractionalization (ERC721-ERC1155-ERC20), and it provides permissionless liquidity and oracle for all kinds of NFTs. Based on a deeply reformed ERC1155 middle layer standard, Fracton is building a non-status smart contract system to increase the protocolâ€™s efficiency, lower gas fees, and maximize asset security.
